overview: Boris Sacharov is a man on a mission. Picking up where we left off in Czech Tales, Part 1, Boris is still consumed with finding his true love and our heartsick hero gradually learns that the search for the elusive Jakub is presenting him with more of a challenge to than he expects. But more importantly, Boris realizes that with whatever distractions that fall his way, they will never deter him from his quest.
title: Czech Tales 2
